name: SmartKitchenDocknavigation
0:
”Alexa, go home”
”Alexa, go right”
”Alexa, scroll left”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Smart Kitchen Dock Navigation Skill enables the control of visual content via voice command on the BSH Smart Kitchen Dock. The use of this skill requires a Smart Kitchen Dock.

The skill will be enabled and linked with the Smart Kitchen Dock automatically during Smart Kitchen dock set up. To use the Smart Kitchen Dock navigation skill, you need to link your Home Connect account to Alexa. If you already have a Home Connect account, simply follow the Smart Kitchen Dock app instructions to sign in to your Home Connect account. If you want to create an account, download the Home Connect app from the relevant app store. Open the Home Connect app and register a Home Connect account with your name and e-mail address. You will then receive a confirmation link in an e-mail. Open the link to complete your registration. Then return to the Smart Kitchen Dock app and sign in to your Home Connect account.


[Getting started]
To set up your Smart Kitchen Dock:

1) Please download the Smart Kitchen Dock app from the relevant app store and install the app on your tablet or smartphone.
2) Pair your tablet or smartphone with the Smart Kitchen Dock.
3) Connect the Smart Kitchen Dock to your local Wi-Fi network. 
4) If you already have a Home Connect account, simply follow the Smart Kitchen Dock app instructions to sign in to your Home Connect account. If you want to create an account, download the Home Connect app from the relevant app store. Open the Home Connect app and register a Home Connect account with your name and e-mail address. You will then receive a confirmation link in an e-mail. Open the link to complete your registration. Then return to the Smart Kitchen Dock app and sign in to your Home Connect account.
5) Sign in to your Amazon account to enable and link the Smart Kitchen Dock navigation skill with the Smart Kitchen Dock.
6) Follow the Smart Kitchen Dock app instructions to activate the Auto Launch Function for the Smart Kitchen Dock app.


[Features of Smart Kitchen Dock navigation skill]
Once the Smart Kitchen Dock navigation skill is enabled you can navigate through your Smart Kitchen Dock visual contents by voice:

- Return to the home screen
- Open the settings menu
- Scroll/go left
- Scroll/go right
- Scroll/go up
- Scroll/go down


[Examples of Voice Commands]

- Return to the home screen
Alexa, go home
- Open the settings menu
Alexa, open settings
- Scroll left
Alexa, scroll/go left
- Scroll right
Alexa, scroll/go right
- Scroll up
Alexa, scroll/go up
- Scroll down
Alexa, scroll/go down
